page.title: 10MAINS OF CROY FARM.
page.content: In Croy and its surroundings, farming is the main work.The main farm in Croy is called The Mains Of Croy farm.The livestock are cattle, but only a few,and some sheep.Their livestock are entered into Cattle Markets such as the Fraser and Macdonald Markets.Their fields contain grass,barley,potatoes,turnips,carrots and corn but it all depends on what season it is.Their sheds store hay,straw,potatoes and other various types of vegetables.A full day of farming starts at five-thirty in the morning till half past seven at night.Machines such as tractors,ploughs and combine harvesters help people with farming today.Today we don't need so many people as in the past for farm work.
